title: Band on the run
author: Garry McGEE
description: Band on the Run: A History of Paul McCartney and Wings by Garry McGee provides an in-depth look at the formation, success, and legacy of Paul McCartney’s post-Beatles band, Wings.

title: Still Here
author: Alexandra Jacobs
description: Still Here: The Madcap, Nervy, Singular Life of Elaine Stritch by Alexandra Jacobs is a captivating biography of the iconic, bold, and complex Broadway and television legend Elaine Stritch.

title: ParaNorman
author: Elizabeth Cody Kimmel
description: ParaNorman by Elizabeth Cody Kimmel follows a boy who can talk to ghosts as he must save his town from a centuries-old curse in a thrilling and spooky adventure.

title: The Thrifty Guide To Ancient Rome
author: Jonathan W. Stokes
description: The Thrifty Guide to Ancient Rome by Jonathan W. Stokes is a humorous and educational handbook designed for time travelers, offering survival tips, historical facts, and engaging insights into life in Ancient Rome.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventur
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 3 - Stardust Crusaders by Hirohiko Araki follows Jotaro Kujo and his allies on a globe-trotting quest to defeat the immortal vampire Dio using their Stand powers.

title: The Time Warp
author: Jon Scieszka
description: The Time Warp Trio: Marco? Polo! by Jon Scieszka follows three friends on a wild time-traveling adventure to meet Marco Polo and face unexpected challenges along the Silk Road.
